refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts string argument to lower case

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: lcase returns a copy of string str with all the uppercase alphabetical characters converted to corresponding lowercase letters. This includes also the diacritic letters present in the ISO 8859/1 standard in range 192 - 222 decimal, excluding the character 223, German double-s which stays the same.
lower is an alias for lcase.
